price: 4. Soki botubeli epai ya Allah, mitema na bino mipetuami, kasi soki bosalisani likolo naye, boyeba ete ya solo Allah azali mobateli naye, mpe anzelu Djibril lokola elongo na bandimi ya malamu, Mpe na sima ba anzelu bakosunga ye.
arabic: إِن تَتُوبَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ صَغَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمَاۖ وَإِن تَظَٰهَرَا عَلَيۡهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰهُ وَجِبۡرِيلُ وَصَٰلِحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in tatūbā ilā al-lahi faqad ṣaghat qulūbukumā wa-in taẓāharā ʿalayhi fa-inna al-laha huwa mawlāhu wajib'rīlu waṣāliḥu al-mu'minīna wal-malāikatu baʿda dhālika ẓahīrun
